channel.title: Too Risky? && walkback
channel.description:
I was wondering if it was risky or too detectable to have your script set to perfectnorth
because i was thinking of using it for my script but if its too detectable then i have to find a way aruond it
and also...does anyone know if there is a tut on making walk and walkback paths from going to and from a bank when you are comign from a place too far away to just detect bank symbol.

item.title: Too Risky? && walkback
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

I change the compass as i go so it wont always be the saem direction throughout the entire script.

And for the walking, make it so if it finds the bank symbol, click it and then start walking from there and if it finds a different landmark, tell it to click it and use a walking procedure. For landmarks, you can use DTM’s, symbols, maybe unique colors, stuff like that.

Read full topic
